name: Winged Samurai
overview: Summer, 1942. A squadron of German Fw 190 fighters is scrambling to protect a U-Boat base from incoming Allied air raids. In Jagdstaffel the player commands a fighter squadron tasked to intercept enemy bombers. The player's Focke Wulfs must try to elude the fighter screen and approach American B-17s from their weakest spot. Orders (via keyboard input) are executed in turns.
